title: Indian Army Embraces AI for Enhanced National Security
description: The Indian Army has launched initiatives to integrate artificial intelligence into its operations for improved speed, precision, and national security. With projects like a unified AI platform, Electronic Intelligence Collation and Analysis System, and Predictive Threat Modelling, the Army is moving towards a technology-driven approach.

title: What if AI is quietly fixing prices without anyone noticing?
description: In a study on ‘Artificial intelligence and competition’ the Competition Commission of India said that it will set up a think-tank to consult on matters of digital markets and AI, promote co-ordination with other regulators for effective oversight to ensure fair-trade practices.

title: US stocks advance on AMD-OpenAI partnership, big bank deal
